inclusion.criterion: adult with a multiple sclerosis diagnosis
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: diagnosis of Paget's Disease of Bone was confirmed

inclusion.criterion: able to walk 50 meters without human help
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient is a 60 year old man complaining of frequent headaches, generalized bone pain and difficulty chewing that started 6 years ago and is worsening.

exclusion.criterion: relapse of multiple sclerosis in the last 7-days
exclusion.label: not_met
not_met
exclusion.evidence: Further evaluation shows increased uptake of radioactive substance as well as an increase in urinary pyridinoline.

notes: The patient has Paget's Disease of Bone and will be started on Bisphosphonate therapy.
